line.words: Lè m pral lekòl, gen yon moun k ap suiv mwen.

subtitle.line: When I go to school someone follows me.
When I go to school someone follows me.

line.words: Mwen pase devan yon kafe restoran, yon pak ak yon sinema, yon moun ap suiv mwen.

subtitle.line: I pass in front of a café, a park and a cinema, and someone follows me.
I pass in front of a café, a park and a cinema, and someone follows me.

line.words: Mwen vire adwat devan yon boutik, agoch devan biwo lapòs la. Gen yon rivyè devan m, gen yon moun k ap suiv mwen.

subtitle.line: I turn right by a shop, left at the post office and in front of me there is a river, and someone follows me.
I turn right by a shop, left at the post office and in front of me there is a river, and someone follows me.

line.words: Mwen travèse yon pasaj pyeton anfas mize a, touprè legliz la, dèyè lekòl la, gen yon moun k ap suiv mwen.

subtitle.line: I cross the pedestrian-crossing opposite the museum next to the church behind the school, and someone follows me.
I cross the pedestrian-crossing opposite the museum next to the church behind the school, and someone follows me.

line.words: Mwen mache ak zanmi m yo touprè estasyon tren an. To pran tren, kamyonèt oswa taksi. Mwen kontinye poukont mwen a pye, epi gen yon moun k ap suiv mwen.

subtitle.line: I walk with my friends near to the train station. They go by train or by bus or by taxi. I continue in foot by myself and someone follows me.
I walk with my friends near to the train station. They go by train or by bus or by taxi. I continue in foot by myself and someone follows me.

line.words: Toudwat devan m, nan nan viraj la, lwen de lakay mwen, mwen retounen. Mwen di “Bonjou mimi. Pito m menmen ou lakay mwen. Demen, mwen kwè m ap pran kamyonèt.”

subtitle.line: Straight ahead, on the corner, far from home I turn around. “Hello puss,” I say. I better take you home. Tomorrow I think I am going to go by bus.
Straight ahead, on the corner, far from home I turn around. “Hello puss,” I say. I better take you home. Tomorrow I think I am going to go by bus.
